references.paper_title: Quantum approximate optimization is computationally universal
references.reason: This paper proves the computational universality of QAOA, establishing its theoretical foundation and significance.

references.paper_title: Exponentially many local minima in quantum neural networks
references.reason: This paper addresses the challenges of training quantum neural networks, providing crucial context for understanding the difficulty of optimizing QAOA parameters.

references.paper_title: Theory of overparametrization in quantum neural networks
